titles.title: Comprehensive characterization of atmospheric organic carbon at a forested site

custom_metadata.assertion: E.S.C., H.S., and D.R.W. are employees of Aerodyne Research, Inc. (ARI), which developed and commercialized several of the advanced mass spectrometric instruments utilized in this study.
